articles.title: Behind Jyothi Yarraji’s handwritten Asian Games tribute: Late mentor who spotted her talent, taught her how to clear hurdles, gave her shoes - The Indian Express
articles.description: Sai Gautham, also a hurdler, passed away in August following an accident; Jyothi Yarraji had written a note of gratitude on the back of her bib: “Gautham, this for you. We miss you”.
articles.content: When Jyothi Yarraji, India’s bright young hurdler, stood on the podium after winning the silver medal at the recent Asian Games in Hangzhou, at the back of the bib, which she had unpinned and held in… [+3958 chars]
